content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Juan Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you for your interest in the apartment, Juan. I believe that we can come to an agreement on the rental price. However, I am looking for a fair market value for the space. May I ask what your budget is for the rental?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: My budget is 1500 Euros per month. Can you offer me a rental price within this budget?
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: I apologize for not being able to accommodate your budget. The apartment you are interested in is quite popular, and I am looking to maximize my gains. I am willing to negotiate, but I am not able to offer a rental price within your budget. May I ask what your maximum budget is for the rental?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
My maximum budget is 1500 Euros per month. Is there any other option for me?

If not, I will have to look for another apartment.

Thank you for your understanding.

TERMINATE.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: I apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused. Unfortunately, I am unable to offer a rental price within your budget. I understand that you may need to look for another apartment. Thank you for your understanding and for considering the apartment. I wish you the best of luck in your search.
name: Heinrich Heine
